channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Two Major Energy Facilities in Tehran Hit in Israeli Strikes
item.description: Across Iran’s capital, flames and smoke covered the sky.

item.title: Pope Leo Delivers a Message to a Ballpark Celebration in Chicago
item.description: “Recognize that God is present,” he said in a recorded video to a crowd gathered at the home stadium of the White Sox.

item.title: As Trump Celebrates Army’s Founding, His Critics Take to the Streets
item.description: President Trump held a military parade the same day that hundreds of protests took place, in what amounted to a split-screen show of force.

item.title: What My Dad Gave Me
item.description: I think my dad thought that had he had boys, fatherhood would have been different.

item.description: Across Iran’s capital, flames and smoke covered the sky.

item.title: Revoking the Visas of Chinese Students in the U.S. Is a Horrible Idea
item.description: Canceling the visas of Chinese students in the United States is a horrible idea.

item.title: What to Know About Iran’s Ballistic Missiles and the Attacks on Israel
item.description: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel presented Iran’s sophisticated ballistic missiles as a critical threat to Israel’s survival.

item.title: U.S. Senator Tina Smith reacts to Minnesota shootings

item.description: Today is the day of the big military parade in Washington.
